item.title: Laura Phillips – Personal Injury Lawyer
item.dc:creator: roberto1122
item.content:encoded:


About

Laura Phillips, at 35, has already made significant strides in her legal career, focusing on general practice and personal injury law.

Lawyer Rating:

  • Legal Knowledge 100% 100%
  • Legal Analysis 95% 95%
  • Communication 95% 95%
  • Professionalism 100% 100%

Our Score:



/5

Outstanding!



Biography

With 10 years of experience, she has developed a reputation for being a passionate and adept lawyer who is committed to representing her clients’ best interests.

Laura graduated from the University of Chicago Law School with a deep understanding of various legal disciplines. Her career began with a focus on general legal matters, where she honed her skills in addressing a wide range of legal issues. Her interest in personal injury law grew from a desire to advocate for individuals facing adversity due to injuries caused by others.

Laura’s approach to law is characterized by a blend of thorough legal knowledge, keen analytical skills, and a compassionate understanding of her clients’ situations. Whether negotiating settlements or representing clients in court, Laura is known for her resilience and ability to strategize effectively for optimal outcomes.

In addition to her legal practice, Laura is actively involved in community service, providing pro bono legal advice to those who cannot afford representation. She also participates in legal seminars and workshops, sharing her knowledge and staying updated on the latest legal trends.



Practice Areas

– Based Immigration: Assisting with visa applications, adjustments of status, and consular processing.

– Employment Visas: Handling H-1B visas, L-1 visas, and other employment-related immigration matters.

– Naturalization and Citizenship: Guiding clients through the citizenship application process.

– Asylum and Refugee Status: Representing clients in asylum applications, interviews, and court proceedings.

– Deportation Defense: Providing legal defense in deportation and removal cases.



Legal Challenges We Can Help with

Contract disputes, estate planning, landlord-tenant issues, small claims, personal injury claims, family law matters, traffic violations, misdemeanor defense, property transactions, debt collection, consumer rights, employment law, business formation and compliance.


Fees

– Free Consultation
– Credit Card Accepted


Languages

– English: Spoken, Written
– Spanish: Spoken, Written



Professional Experience

– Immigration Attorney, Nguyen Immigration Law Firm: Leading her own practice with a focus on providing comprehensive immigration legal services.

– Associate Attorney, LA Immigration Advocates: Gained extensive experience in various immigration cases, including complex asylum claims.

– Legal Intern, Immigrant Rights Project: Assisted in legal research and client representation in immigration matters.



Education

– J.D., Harvard Law School: Specialization in Corporate Law, Magna Cum Laude, Harvard Law Review Editor.

– B.A. in Political Science, Stanford University: Honors Program, Focus on International Relations and Economics.

– Study Abroad Program, University of Oxford: Concentration in International Law and Global Governance.

– Continuing Legal Education: Ongoing courses in Intellectual Property, Business Ethics, and International Business Law.



Awards

– “Top Corporate Lawyer of the Year”, National Legal Excellence Awards: Recognized for outstanding achievements in corporate law and significant contributions to the legal community.



item.title: AMS Law Office Brooklyn, NY
item.dc:creator: roberto1122
item.content:encoded:


About

AMS Law Office in Brooklyn, NY offers expert legal services across multiple practice areas. Our dedicated team is committed to providing exceptional and personalized legal solutions to our clients.

Lawyer Rating:

  • Legal Knowledge 100% 100%
  • Legal Analysis 95% 95%
  • Communication 95% 95%
  • Professionalism 100% 100%

Our Score:



/5

Outstanding!



Biography

Our firm is dedicated to supporting businesses and entrepreneurs with expert legal advice and innovative solutions.

Our Business Law division offers a full spectrum of services including corporate formation, mergers and acquisitions, commercial contracts, and dispute resolution. We understand the complexities of the business world and provide legal strategies that align with our clients’ commercial objectives.

In the field of Intellectual Property, we specialize in protecting the creative and innovative assets of businesses and individuals. Our services cover patent and trademark filing, licensing agreements, copyright law, and intellectual property litigation. We are committed to safeguarding our clients’ intellectual endeavors and ensuring their ideas remain protected in a competitive marketplace.

At Hamilton & Reed Legal Solutions, we pride ourselves on our forward-thinking approach and our ability to adapt to the evolving legal landscape. Our team of attorneys combines legal proficiency with a deep understanding of business and technology, making us uniquely positioned to address the legal needs of modern businesses and innovators.



Practice Areas

– Family Law: Divorce, Child Custody, Adoption, Domestic Violence.

– Criminal Defense: DUI/DWI, Drug Offenses, White-Collar Crimes, Juvenile Defense.

– Real Estate Law: Property Transactions, Landlord-Tenant Disputes, Zoning Laws.

– Personal Injury: Auto Accidents, Medical Malpractice, Workers’ Compensation.

– Business Law: Corporate Formation, Contract Negotiations, Employment Law.



Legal Challenges We Can Help with

Divorce, Child Custody Disputes, DUI/DWI Defense, Drug Possession Charges, White-Collar Criminal Defense, Business Formation and Dissolution, Intellectual Property Rights, IRS Audit Representation, Chapter 7 Bankruptcy Filing, Debt Collection Lawsuits, Estate Planning, Property Division in Divorce, Adoption Legalities, Alimony and Spousal Support, Employment Discrimination Cases, Corporate Litigation, Tax Evasion Defense, Fraudulent Transactions, Real Estate Disputes, Landlord-Tenant Conflicts.


Fees

– Free Consultation
– Credit Card Accepted


Languages

– English: Spoken, Written
– Spanish: Spoken, Written



Key Attorneys

– John Doe, Senior Partner: A seasoned litigator with 20 years in criminal defense and a strong advocate for justice.

– Jane Smith, Family Law Expert: Specializing in family law for 15 years, Jane is known for her compassionate and effective approach to sensitive cases.

– Mike Johnson, Real Estate Attorney: With a decade of experience, Mike excels in real estate law, helping clients navigate complex property matters.



Awards

– “Top Corporate Lawyer of the Year”, National Legal Excellence Awards: Recognized for outstanding achievements in corporate law and significant contributions to the legal community.


